content.question: A. Using the location shown in Image 1, describe the pilgrimage location in terms of a cultural landscape. B. Explain how the global population distribution of the followers of an ethnic religion relates to the religion’s place of origin. C. Using the location shown in Image 2, explain how a single pilgrimage site can attract people from different belief systems. D. Explain ONE way that relocation diffusion can account for the spatial patterns of international travel to pilgrimage locations. E. Explain ONE way that ethnic nationalism can result in conflicts over the political control of pilgrimage locations.
